javax.swing.plaf

Class ComboBoxUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.ComboBoxUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicComboBoxUI, MultiComboBoxUI

    public abstract class ComboBoxUI
extends ComponentUI
    Pluggable look and feel interface for JComboBox.
